channel.title: Japan-blogs on Campbell Codes
channel.description: Recent content in Japan-blogs on Campbell Codes

item.title: Kichijoji
item.description: Word has started to get around in the workplace that I’ve been going on these short excursions, and I find myself getting suggestions about where to go next.

item.title: Ameyoko Market
item.description: Hello all! It’s been a while since I’ve written one of these, so I wanted to give a quick heads up about what I’m planning to do going forward.

item.title: First Post in Japan!
item.description: I am finally in Japan! This is the first of many blog posts where I will attempt to update everyone on my adventures.
